Description: AVAILABLE 9/15/2023 $4250-- HEAT AND HOT WATER INCLUDED, IN UNIT LAUNDRY. Welcome home to a brand NEW Gold LEED Certifiable development in Cambridge. Solid Maple hardwood floors throughout, bright, open layouts with oversized windows, gas stove, stainless steel appliances, granite counters, in-unit washer/dryer. Heat / hot water / gas cooking included in rent. Steps away from Trader Joe's, CVS, Whole Foods, Starbucks, restaurants, shops, and more. Amenities include media room, fitness center, guest suite, bike storage and more. Pet-friendly, non-smoking building. PICS ARE OF A SIMILAR UNIT IN THE BUILDING (Reference #179292)
